name: Slinger (Mino)
description:
THE GAME

In SLINGER, you must sling your spaceship to destroy your enemies.

CONTROLS

Click and drag with your mouse or mousepad to input the direction and the force you want to sling your spaceship to and release to let it anihilate your enemies.

UPDATES

The game only has 20 levels and some mechanics are only used once but I'm not sure I will make any updates for I want to move on to another project.
